subCopy: Google Associate Cloud Engineer Certified and Alibaba Cloud Certified Professional, also Certified Kubernetes Application Development(not exam yet) As a Devops Engineer Job Role with 2 year of hands-on experience supporting, optimizing, and automating mission-critical deployments to Kubernetes Cluster in automated services. Leveraged configuration management, CI/CD, and critical DevOps processes. Specialized Build monitoring system infrastructure, System Logs using Prometheus, Promtail, Loki & Grafana.
